title: How to Make a Raspberry Italian Cream Soda

steps.headline: Pour 2 ounces of Chambord into a tall glass.
Put in 1/2 teaspoon of heavy cream.
Put some whipped cream on the top.
Add a couple yummy fresh, washed raspberries and you're done!

text: Pour 2 ounces of Chambord into a tall glass.  Add 1/2 cup of club soda.  Put in 1/2 teaspoon of heavy cream.  Stir well before drinking.  Put some whipped cream on the top.  Add a couple yummy fresh, washed raspberries and you're done!
